name: Onda Tablet Updates
short_description:
This project is a place for Onda Tablet update files.  Typically .rar files with .img.  These are Onda proprietary.  The Windows utility OndaSuite is normally included.  It flashes the new firmware (Rom) code.  Linux users can use LiveSuite instead of OndaSuite.  I had a very difficult time getting update file for my Onda V801.  Downloads from Baidu always timed out.  Thus the reason for this project.  Feel free to email me with links to other hard to download or hard to find updates for Onda tablets.  They are a great value and very well made, worth the hassle of little English language support.  My email is safelyiniowa@yahoo.com.

Note that uploads are not ready for use unless a description is entered here.  Sometimes uploads fail due to large size.  

Valid uploads:
V801 = firmware for V801 and V812, maybe others, note that the only successful upload  has a size of 440.8 Mb.
